CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI , and INV enter the room . INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI immediately goes over to the jack+in+the+box on the floor
MOT puts her bag down on the floor and walks towards CHI
CHI looks up at the door
<$=1> MOT removes her coat and hangs it by the door
CHI looks up at MOT then down at jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT walks over to CHI and squat next to her on the floor
CHI tries to open the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown in the jack+in+the+box then releases and tries to close the lid
MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box to her and sets it in front of CHI
MOT pulls back the lid and holds it
CHI pushes clown down into the box
MOT starts to close the lid
CHI closes the lid hitting it twice
MOT holds jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
CHI has difficulty turning the handle
MOT motions to the handle briefly
CHI turns handle slowly then stops and touches the lid
CHI tries to turn the handle
<bef> MOT makes turning gesture with one hand
CHI looks intently at the jack+in+the+box
MOT sits on the floor beside CHI
<aft> CHI reaches for the jack+in+the+box with her other hand
MOT watches CHI and holds the jack+in+the+box
CHI begins to turn handle in opposite direction
<$=1> MOT makes turning gesture with her hand
<aft> MOT watches CHI and holds the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns handle in the right direction
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
CHI looks up towards the camera
<aft> MOT points to top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
MOT looks at CHI nodding her head yes
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
CHI's hand slips off the handle
CHI reaches for the lid on the jack+in+the+box
MOT taps the side of the jack+in+the+box that the handle is on
CHI starts to turn the handle
MOT pulls back away from jack+in+the+box
CHI jerks back away from jack+in+the+box then stares at it
MOT moves back a little away from CHI
CHI holds her hand over the clown's head
CHI attempts to stuff clown back into the box
<bef> MOT moves the book out of the way
MOT looks around room then reaches out for jack+in+the box
<$=1> MOT holds onto the sides of the jack+in+the+box
MOT lets go of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown into the box then releases it
MOT reaches over holding the lid of the jack+in+the+box open
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box in the box
MOT gently pushes the lid down
CHI closes the lid on the clown
MOT leans back letting go of the box entirely
CHI stuffs the clown into the box with one hand
CHI reaches over with her other hand pressing down on the lid
CHI starts to let go of the lid
CHI pushes the lid down , holds it briefly then lets go
the lid doesn't catch and the clown pops up
MOT leans forward then turns the handle once
CHI tries to stuff the clown into the box tilting the jack+in+the+box to her
MOT watches CHI then turns and looks over towards the desk
MOT is sitting on the floor but moves herself back towards the table away from CHI
CHI looks up towards the table then around the room
MOT looks up towards the ceiling then looks at CHI
CHI looks up then looks at MOT
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes down the clown and holds it
MOT leans forward pointing to the lid
<aft> MOT slowly pushes the lid closed
MOT leans forward reaching for the jack+in+the+box
CHI moves the cover back and forth
MOT holds a finger on the lid
CHI stuffs the clown into the box with both hands
CHI looks up then points at something
CHI looks down touching the rug beside her
CHI holds out her finger towards MOT
<$=1> MOT reaches over then moves the jack+in+the+box in front of herself
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box intently and starts to lean toward it
CHI jerks back quickly then looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
CHI looks up at MOT then points at the clown
CHI pokes the clown's face then retracts her hand
<1> MOT stuffs the clown into the box with one hand
CHI motions to the jack+in+the+box with her hand as she looks at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI touches her hand to her face
<bef> MOT closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches for the jack+in+the+box then leans back
<bef> CHI lets go of the handle
MOT nods and looks at CHI
CHI looks around turning toward the wall pointing up then reaches for the wastebasket
MOT looks at CHI nodding her head yes . <aft> MOT looks back towards the desk
CHI turns around looking at MOT
CHI points at chair beside her
CHI reaches for the chair then pulls herself up on her feet using the chair as a support
CHI pulls at the top cushion on the chair
CHI pulls at the top cushion on the chair
CHI faces MOT looking down at the floor
MOT picks up a toy that is on the floor in front of CHI
MOT turns to the side while holding the toy and then places it on the floor beside her
MOT refers to the fact that the pillows are attached to the chair
CHI walks towards MOT then bends down to pick up the toy next to MOT
MOT looks down at the floor
CHI kneels down on the floor with her back to MOT . CHI looks down at toy in her hands
MOT watches CHI and looks around the room restlessly
CHI squeezes the toy duck and drops it a few times
<aft> CHI holds the duck and looks at it intently
CHI turns around facing MOT . CHI holds out toy in front of her
MOT takes the toy duck from CHI
<aft> MOT looks down at the duck in her hand
CHI sits on the floor and watches MOT
MOT holds toy in front of CHI
<bef> MOT turns the duck to face her
CHI reaches for duck MOT is holding
CHI removes duck from MOT's hand then squeaks it
MOT hands the duck to CHI
CHI looks around placing the duck on the floor in front of her then looks at the football on the floor
CHI picks up the ball beside her
CHI holds ball up and looks at MOT
CHI reaches for the toy duck
CHI picks up the duck squeaking it then puts it back down
CHI looks down at the ball
<aft> CHI lifts the ball to her mouth
CHI throws ball in direction of MOT
<aft> CHI looks down towards the duck on the floor
MOT looks around while holding football
CHI looks up at the door
CHI turns herself around while sitting on the floor . CHI looks in direction of jack+in+the+box and reaches for it
MOT holds the football and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then up towards the door
something heard outside in the hall
MOT looks over her shoulder at the camera and table
CHI looks into the camera then down
CHI looks down at the floor
MOT leans down and looks under the table
CHI looks down towards the floor
CHI looks up at the door
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box and points to it
CHI retracts her hand and looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI leans forward pointing at MOT then points at the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches for jack+in+the+box turning it around so it is closer to her
MOT looks up at the door
CHI looks up at the door

INV enters room and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT . INV puts CHI in the sassy seat at the table and clears away the toys from Warm-up . INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters the room and explains Forbidden Object task to MOT . INV has MOT sit next to CHI and clears toys from Small Scale Activity .
INV motions to MOT to sit in chair next to CHI who is seated at the table facing the camera
CHI sits at the table holding the necklace and watching INV
INV opens the drawer and removes the object
INV puts forbidden object on the table in front of CHI
INV sets the object into motion
CHI blinks her eyes and leans back slightly away from forbidden object while holding on to necklace
MOT leans forward to look at CHI
CHI slowly reaches for the object
MOT leans close to CHI and reaches for her hand
MOT moves CHI's hand away from the object
CHI puts her hand on the table
MOT leans back in her chair and watches CHI
MOT leans forward closer to CHI while looking at object
CHI lifts hand in direction of object
CHI looks at object then reaches for it
MOT leans close to CHI looking at her
CHI removes hand from object while looking at it then glances at MOT briefly
CHI reaches for object pointing at the individual balls on the end of it
CHI moves her hand away from object and looks up towards INV
MOT glances up at INV then looks at CHI
CHI watches as INV removes the object
INV explains four PCI boxes to MOT . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT carries CHI to middle of floor and puts her down on her feet after removing her from the chair
MOT walks over to desk and out of camera view
CHI looks at door as INV leaves
MOT bends down in front of CHI placing a box on the floor in front of her
CHI turns in direction of MOT and box looking down
CHI bends down reaching into box while looking over her shoulder at something behind her
CHI picks up the ball but box remains stuck to it
MOT kneels in front of CHI watching her
<aft> the box falls off the ball
MOT moves box off to the side
CHI holds the ball and stares down at it
CHI drops the ball to the floor and walks towards the wastebasket
MOT looks in direction of CHI
CHI looks in the trash briefly then turns to face MOT
<bef> MOT tosses ball up and down
MOT holds ball out in front of herself
<bef> CHI walks a few steps towards MOT
<bef> CHI points in direction of chair . CHI shakes her head no as she speaks
MOT holds ball out in front of CHI
CHI bends down at the knees and points under the chair
MOT makes a rolling gesture as she holds the ball out
CHI takes the ball from MOT
<bef> CHI drops the ball into the box
CHI turns towards MOT but looks at the ball
MOT picks up box then turns it upside down to dump out the ball
CHI walks over to the ball and picks it up
<aft> CHI turns towards MOT as she holds the ball
<bef> MOT puts box back on the floor off to her side
CHI walks over to the box and drops the ball
the ball misses the box and rolls on the floor
CHI bends down over the box looking inside
CHI points into the box as she leans over it
MOT leans forward then looks into the box
<aft> MOT leans back then picks the ball up off the floor
CHI looks down at the box
CHI moves away from MOT as she then touches the cushion of the chair
CHI looks down at the chair
CHI turns away from the chair
<4-6> MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI pulls on her dress as she walks across the room towards the door
MOT throws the ball back into the box
MOT turns and looks at CHI
CHI turns so she is facing MOT then looks at MOT then down at the floor
MOT shakes her head no as she looks at CHI
CHI glances over at the ball
<bef> CHI turns then points up at the door . CHI looks at MOT
MOT refers to some noise out in the hall
MOT picks up box and puts it on the desk behind her
CHI looks up as MOT moves another box
MOT looks at box then places it on floor in front of her
CHI walks over to where MOT is
CHI looks down at the box on the floor
CHI bends down leaning over the box then reaches for it
CHI attempts to open the box
<aft> CHI stands up looking down at the box
MOT loosens the top of the box to assist CHI
CHI bends down removing the cover of the box then pulls out the contents . CHI puts towel on the floor behind her
MOT watches as CHI removes towel from the box

CHI looks down at the box
CHI bends down then pushes the top of the box off to the side

CHI walks across the room with the box then puts the box on the table

CHI pulls the seat out from underneath the table

MOT finishes wrapping the towel around CHI's waist
<$=1> MOT holds the towel in place

noise outside in the corridor causes the CHI to look in the direction of the door
CHI turns away from MOT . CHI walks away from MOT holding the towel against her waist

MOT is out of camera range

there is a doll on the desk
